Description:
Compact and Complete
Blending character with clean, crisp lines of contemporary styling, this 3 bedroom home has been refreshed and is ready to revel in. Compact and complete, it offers a fuss-free lifestyle in close proximity to all kinds of local conveniences and attractions.
Recently repainted and featuring ducted heating and cooling, it's as warm in the winter as it is cool in the summertime. A resplendent kitchen with stainless steel oven and ceramic cooktop sit amongst loads of bench space, ample cupboards and pot-drawers. Beautiful bathroom fittings include a clawfoot slipper tub creating a surprisingly complementary contrast combined with modern vanity and tiling.
The living room is a great size at 6.2 metres long and has wide corner windows to welcome morning sunshine inside. Take advantage of the quiet street by adding green screens to the broad side patio at the entrance for a lovely outdoor living area.
Fully fenced in Colourbond panels, the property also has a small rear yard to secure pets and little people, plus off-street parking for one vehicle. But you can leave that car at home, as so much is within walking distance. Stroll to schools, college, medical practice, pharmacy, post office, hairdresser, pool, botanic gardens, pub, footy, clothing alterations, racecourse, golf, cafe, takeaway, butcher and baker. No candlestick maker, but there is a kindergarten 260 metres up the road and buses around the corner. It's only a 7 minute drive or 12 minute bike ride into the heart of the city to make life at this fabulous address even easier.
This home could potentially achieve a rental return of between $310 and $320 per week.
Internal area
110m²
Insights: 49 Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
First Home Buyers Save Thousands on Stamp Duty
Ideally located within easy reach of parkland, public transport & Epsom shopping centre is this easy care home. The home boasts 4 generous bedrooms, master with BIR & ensuite, robes to the others. Well equipped kitchen with island bench & stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. Formal sitting room to the front of the property & delightful kitchen/meals family room overlooking & opening to the rear yard. Other features include family bathroom, gas central heating, evp ducted cooling, paved outdoor entertaining area, double lock up garage with remote roller door.
Internal area
220m²

Description:
Ruby Manor - Modern Period Charm
The iceberg rose edged path leads to the French entrance doors to this eye-catching modern period home capturing the bygone era. Boasting an authentic facade with a spacious floor plan to give the best of heritage style with modern building quality.
Charming and filled with classic detail, this home built in the heritage style also fits into the urban landscape, and presents a warm and welcoming vista to everyone who visits.
The entrance opens into the expansive lounge dining area that continues onto the kitchen living.
Consisting of four spacious bedrooms built in period style, the master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, and three bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by the three piece bathroom.
This home boasts quality fittings and furnishings, double garage with side access to rear / side yard.
Quiet location serviced by bike paths and close to shops and schools.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY PLUS FOR LIVING AND WORKING (STCA) CORNER POSITION - 730m2
This 730m2 corner block of residential zoned property offers multiple opportunities for development/renovation. Situated on high profile Napier St, this property will deliver substantial exposure for your business.
The main building consists of - reception, clinic rooms, kitchen, storage and bathroom/wet areas. The building at the rear of the property has 3 separate rooms and a carport and is ideal for storage. The site also offers additional off street parking at the rear.
This property was previously run as a veterinary clinic and would be suitable for similar business or cafe STCA.
The corner block also offers the opportunity for subdivision (STCA)
For a home - enjoy the space and proximity to Lake Weeroona and Weeroona College, for business - enjoy the exposure and flexibility!

Description:
Affordable Living in a Popular Location
Recapturing the elegance of period heritage, a wealth of character graces the interior of this quaint cottage behind its white picket fence. However, modern needs must also be met as they have been here, with kitchen and bathroom essentials in place.
Restored to glory with a rich colour palette infusing warmth, features abound beneath high ceilings with embellished cornices. Adding to the grandeur, corbelled mantels surround fireplaces, deep pelmets top drapes, leadlight shades and chandeliers adorn lights. The dining room owns the charm of floorboards and a lovely wood fire heats the lounge. In the kitchen, solid timber cabinetry fittingly recreates the scene, while a low profile ceramic cooktop resides in synergy.
An entire wall of built-in robes in the main bedroom, lengthy linen press and large pantry are a big bonus in a home of this era. All 3 bedrooms are carpeted and serviced by an updated bathroom and separate toilet. Through the sliding door you'll find a backyard with a huge covered alfresco area and garage with ample space for a workshop. Lawn is edged by garden beds planted with shrubs and trees bordered by good fencing.
It's just 4 minutes' walk to Weeroona College, 20 minutes' stroll to school, shops, lake and hospital. The CBD is only 4 minutes' drive or skip the parking blues, jump on a bike and be there in less than 10 minutes!
Insights: 11 Waratah Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 6 Weeroona Estate - Stage 1 Rheola Drive, White Hills White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Rare Lake Precinct lots are in High Demand
Stage 1 of an exciting and rare opportunity to reside in the lake precinct within 3 kilometres of Bendigo CBD is now available but only if you are quick! Weeroona Estate, as its name suggests, is an easy 1.2 kilometre stroll between Lake Weeroona and what promises to be a sought-after address. The singular new sub-division of such sprawling proportions so close to central Bendigo, it is also handy to the new hospital.
There are 43 lots in total, with stage 1 offering a choice of 23 fully-serviced allotments complete with soil tests to ensure building can begin as soon as possible in Stage 1, with titles available - ready to build!
Already fully wired for NBN.
Mostly level and some with optimal north-facing backyards adds to the lengthy list of reasons to choose yours now. Sizes ranging from 380m2 to 604m2 guarantee exceptional low-maintenance living, where weekends can focus on leisure activities instead of mowing.
Ride or walk nearby Bendigo Creek Trail or Axedale Rail Trail. Take up rowing on the lake, or catch a bus right out the front of the estate into the CBD for shopping, theatre events, a visit to the Art Gallery or simply a Sunday cafe crawl. Kerb and channel plus footpaths on both sides of the street supplement landscaped nature strips to visually enhance the habitat within the estate, along with peaceful reserves for all your fitness requirements. There is also an access road at the rear, connecting to Grace Street, providing a secondary entry and exit point.
Backing onto Weeroona Secondary College sports oval adds further to convenience as well as to aesthetic appeal.
Certain to be in high demand, make your choice today!

Description:
Phenomenal family home.
Nothing beats a good floor plan and this innovative home is full of interesting angles, generous spaces and quality fittings.
A low maintenance terraced front garden leads to the front portico with wide, tiled entry hall flanked by a large formal lounge on one side and guest bedroom/home office opposite.
Next up, the hub of the home incorporates family living and dining areas with a surprisingly spacious kitchen tucked behind a wide waterfall island bench/breakfast bar. With LG gas/electric range, dishwasher, plumbed double fridge space and large walk-in pantry, it ticks all the boxes.
The laundry includes storage and access to the garage before heading through double glass doors to outside.
The hallway is home to two more great-sized bedrooms with robes and one with convenient access to the main bathroom, before it opens to the main suite complete with external access, fully-fitted walk-in robe and spacious ensuite boasting twin vanity basins, separate WC, good storage and big walk-in shower.
Who doesn't love living outdoors and this alfresco entertaining area beckons whatever the weather. Under the roofline, the paved L-shaped area includes heating and cooling from the house and roll-down blinds providing protection from the sun or inclement weather making it perfect for year-round outdoor living.
In summer, the kids can splash about in the slimline 7metre pool while you entertain in absolute comfort.
Quality extras include extensive floor tiling, ducted heating, cooling and vacuum systems, square-set cornice, gas barbecue and sound system to alfresco, external shower, self-cleaning pool, three-car auto garage and side access to Colorbond shed approx 15m x 5.5 m x 4.2m high with paved driveway.
Immaculately presented and sited on a block approx. 804 square metres in a quiet, family-friendly neighbourhood, this one is worth a long, hard look.
Insights: 19 Waterview Drive, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2019 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
EASY CARE, CONTEMPORARY HOME IDEAL FOR SIMPLE LIVING
This low-maintenance contemporary home is positioned in a quiet and peaceful court, just one block from the Bendigo Jockey Club and an easy walk to school and bus stops. Just five minutes in either direction to the amenities of Epsom and central Bendigo, this delightful property has plenty to offer.
The entry hall leads to a bedroom on either side both with built-in robes and one with access to the two-way bathroom. A third bedroom, found off the lounge, also features built-in robes. The bathroom is a good size, offering plenty of natural light, and just over the hall is the laundry with a door opening out to the backyard. At the end of this hallway is secure access to the contained single carport.
In the centre of the home is a spacious open plan kitchen, living and dining room. The modern kitchen offers ample storage and contemporary appliances. Split system heating and cooling in the sizeable lounge room services the house, offering year-round comfort.
Glass sliding doors from the central dining space open out to the easy-care rear garden. Retaining walls provide garden beds and the upper level of the garden is fenced allowing options for a child-friendly play space, veggie garden or more. Two garden sheds provide room to store tools, outdoor equipment or even create a great little workshop.
Additional features include:
Split system heating and cooling
Four-burner gas cooktop and electric oven in the kitchen
Secure access to the rear garden from the side of the house, and via the rear of the enclosed single carport
Gas hot water system
2 x garden sheds
Private and peaceful yet still within easy reach of all you might need, this neat contemporary property is ideal for a downsizer; a buyer wanting to step on to the property ladder; or for an investor seeking that perfect, easy-care rental.

Address: 124 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
SO MUCH TO LOVE HERE
Located in a quiet back street of White Hills amongst a lovely back drop of gum trees is this extremely appealing 1950's brick home, ideal for first home buyers, downsizers and young families alike! Rendered on the exterior and tastefully updated on the inside, the home has seen some modern improvements in recent times whilst thankfully retaining its original character and charm - the type of charm that will have you hooked on first inspection!
Set on a quarter acre allotment (1012m2) with a lovely curb side presence, you would be forgiven for thinking you were in a quiet country town and not 5 minutes from the major regional city of Bendigo! A short walk to the picturesque Botanical Gardens and in close proximity to White Hills amenities, the quiet location is peaceful yet convenient at the same time!
The internal floor plan is functional and spacious, and in terrific order throughout. There are three sizeable bedrooms, two with built in robes and the huge master suite with walk in robe and its own ensuite. A second bathroom fits nicely between the two remaining bedrooms, whilst the renovated laundry has good storage. Ducted heating and cooling control the temperature throughout the home, whilst the 1.5kw solar panel system provides some welcome relief from those expensive power bills. The main feature of the home is definitely the light filled kitchen, dining and living space. Central to all, this expansive area will absolutely delight! The beautiful exposed brick chimney separates the spacious living area and dining space, which is adjacent to the well appointed kitchen. Boasting all the mod cons including dishwasher, stone top island bench, loads of storage, and updated free standing cooking facilities, this delightful area is a treat for the household chef!
Outside, the separate bungalow adds another dimension to the property as a fourth bedroom, studio or home office. There is fantastic shedding available to the tradesman, car enthusiast or home handy man to tinker. There is a covered and semi enclosed deck area the will please lovers of outdoor entertaining, plus a paved courtyard to enjoy in the warmer months. The double carport at the front sits in front of double gates which provide access to the rear for a caravan boat or trailer, where there is a third carport to park any of your spare toys
So much to love here, this property will suitably impress a number of quality home seekers. A hotly contested market should see a quick result, so call now to avoid any disappointment.

Description:
Perfect Home or Investment With Impressive Shedding
Youll instantly be attracted to the homeliness of this much loved residence, which has been tightly held over many years by the same family. The opportunity has now arrived for someone to make this well presented home their own.
Comprising an adaptable floorplan which includes 3 bedrooms, (or 2 plus sitting/study room), spacious formal lounge, open plan kitchen/meals area, and separate bathroom and laundry facilities.
Secure fenced allotment includes a modern carport which allows drive through access to the rear yard. A real drawcard to the property is the large workshop/double garage with concrete floor and power, which is only approx 6 years old.
Year round comfort is assured with multiple heating/cooling options including reverse cycle air-conditioner, and gas heating.
Further attributes include restored roof with insulation, gas cooking, and beautifully established plants/garden.
Within very close proximity to the property youll find a primary and secondary school, the new Bendigo Hospital, popular Lake Weeroona, and the stunning Botanical gardens. All the fine dining, entertainment, and recreational facilities in the CBD are also within 5 mins away.

Address: 185 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Picturesque And Peaceful Family Home
Positioned in a quiet area, across from picturesque bush land, this contemporary, character-filled property is close to all the amenities of White Hills, Epsom and Eaglehawk. Situated on a spacious block, the home has been ideally built to make the most of natural light and the lovely outlook.
Stepping in through the front door, it is apparent that the property has an excellent sense of space and light with generously proportioned rooms, high ceilings and large windows. To the right of the main entry is a large master bedroom with split system, ceiling fan, walk-in wardrobe and spacious ensuite. Across the hall is a bedroom that could also easily serve as an additional living space, library or home office. Two further bedrooms can be found under the eaves upstairs. These sizable rooms both offer ceiling fans and built-in robes and also upstairs is a family bathroom, linen closet and separate toilet. Downstairs, off the main hall, is a full powder room, ideal for guests.
A large formal lounge is at the heart of the home and windows across one wall flood the room with light. The central staircase, leading up to the additional bedrooms, also leads up to a large landing that serves as a third spacious living area. From the lounge downstairs, the hallway leads into a fantastic open plan lounge, kitchen and dining space overlooking the backyard. The modern timber kitchen provides high benchtops and great storage, and a door from this space leads into a laundry, offering access to the yard.
Glass sliding doors open from both downstairs lounge areas to the backyard, and the door from the laundry leads to a fantastic undercover deck. This huge alfresco area is ideal for entertaining and includes power, lighting, ceiling fan and access to the double garage. In the backyard, the neat landscaped garden includes established eucalypts, low maintenance garden beds, a lawn area and a 12m x 8m shed with two roller doors, concrete flooring and power.
Additional features include:
Gas ducted evaporative cooling and ducted heating
Modern kitchen appliances including five-burner gas cooktop, 900mm oven and dishwasher
IXL-tastic in bathrooms
Timber shutters
Excellent storage throughout
Easy and secure vehicle access to the rear garden
Ample off street parking
This gorgeous, spacious home is beautifully finished and presented and would be the perfect house for a family at any stage. Close to schools, supermarkets, bus stops and all amenities, the property is less than 10 minutes drive from the CBD yet the space and location offers a private and peaceful oasis away from it all.

Description:
Classic Victorian with Two Street Frontage
Situated only a short walk from Lake Weeroona, is this period style residence offering comfortable living and a convenient lifestyle.
- Floorplan comprises three spacious bedrooms, open plan kitchen/meals area and separate formal lounge room.
- Impressive allotment, approx 510m2 in size offers frontage to Gleeson Street and rear access to yard from Baden Street.
Perfect for trailer, boat and caravan access, or for the tradesperson looking to construct a large shed with vehicle entry.
- Front and rear verandah, polished timber flooring, high ceilings and fireplace with mantle.
- Close proximity to the new Bendigo Hospital, CBD, schools, recreational facilities and public transport.
- Possibility to subdivide the property (subject to council approval).
An opportunity to secure a quality property, and make improvements in line with your personal tastes.
An appealing residence for astute investors, whilst first home buyers will be hard pressed to find a better home to enter the property market, and save on stamp duty.

Address: Lot 23 Rheola Drive White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Serene Yet City-focused Allotment.- HOUSE AND LAND PACKAGE AVAILABLE NOW..!!
HOUSE AND LAND PACKAGE NOW AVAILABLE...
Introducing the CAPITAL 1219 by WELSH HOMES.
- 3 BED, 2 CAR, 2 BATH
- 19sq of living
- Fixed site costs, NBN/Opticomm provision and council requirements.
- 900mm stainless steel appliances, including dishwasher.
- Stone benchtops to kitchen and overhead cupboards incl.over the fridge.
- All floor coverings: carpet, tiles or timber laminate.
- Tiled shower bases, shower rail assembly with semi frameless shower screens.
- Concrete driveway and path.
- Sectional panel lift garage door with 2 remotes.
- Professionally selected exterior & interior color scheme options.
- Developer guidelines and covenants.
If growing weary of searching for the ideal site to create a dream haven, then this superior allotment is sure to exhilarate! To justifiably influence your decision, its prospects are truly brilliant, literally and figuratively.
Owning an expansive outlook, its scenery spans open grassland, stylish sculptures and treelined Bendigo Creek. But its numerous attributes only begin at this point, for it is situated for extreme convenience and offers more than most of its peers can ever hope to achieve.
Measuring 604 square metres, (14x30 metres) corner positioning permits considering an unusually wide range of floorplan alternatives. Both ranch or narrow facades have potential here. This is an option rarely accessible in current residential building block selection.
All services are available, with the site ready for the building process to begin. Not too big and not too small, the size is perfect for families, busy professionals or empty-nesters preferring low maintenance landscaping or shed (STCA).
An entirely new estate, all surrounding homes will be modern. However, the location is surprisingly central, not an outer suburb like most recent sub-divisions. A few dozen metres from the door, a walking track takes bike riders to primary school in 4 minutes and the CBD in just 8. Weeroona College is right across the road, and nearby Botanical Gardens plus swimming pool awaits family fun. Lake Weeroona itself is also a leisurely 1.2 kilometre stroll away.
For those seeking a blissful, serene yet city-focussed environment, this exceptional slice of Australia promises a fine future.

Description:
Walk To Lake Weeroona!
A perfect opportunity awaits in this wonderfully presented modern home set in a tranquil street that's opposite lovely bushlands and the Bendigo Creek, perfect for dog walks and ideal for families. You're also walking distance to our beautiful Lake Weeroona.
This brilliant floor plan is so well thought out and offers lovely wide hallways and expansive living spaces that make the home feel ever so bright and open.
At the front of the home is the first of two living areas perfect for all your family's cinema needs or simply a front sitting room for the adults.
Central to the home is the large open plan kitchen, meals and second living space that also opens up to the glorious alfresco area.
The kitchen hosts quality stainless steel appliances including a 5-burner gas cooktop, rangehood, dishwasher, pantry and loads of benchtop space which will tick all boxes for the chef of the family.
The four bedrooms are all of good size and have built-in robes. The main bedroom at the rear of the home has views of the lush garden outside and hosts both walk in robe and your own personal ensuite.
Outside you're hit with immaculately landscaped gardens and super lush green grass, perfect for the kids to run around this summer. There's also a brilliant undercover alfresco area that leads directly into the kitchen/main living so you can enjoy outdoor dining.
The other added features to the home include:
Ducted heating and cooling throughout the home, a sizable laundry with access straight out to the yard, lots of linen presses and storage spaces throughout the home and a double remote lock-up garage.
Located in a quiet leafy street and just a stone's throw to Lake Weeroona and Bendigo's CBD you will love being able to walk to some of Bendigo's best cafes. The kids will also have a short walk to school with Weeroona College less than 2km away.
This home will suit every buyer - whether you are looking for a family home in a central location, if you're an investor or a first home buyer. Do not miss the first open home.
